text:
@PeteButtigieg There are experts who are absolutely fine with Herd Immunity, because it's acceptable response to cull the herd when a vaccination doesn't exist.

Your sympathy is inaction bootlicker

Everyone need free testing & treatment Without means testing.

#M4ANow
https://t.co/vbJfdL5Hwp
